subject: Science
title: When Plates Collide
description: A quick win: understand When Plates Collide.

hook.text: The Himalayas are still growing taller every year. Two plates are shoving into each other.

buildup.text: India broke away from Africa 50 million years ago and rammed into Asia.

discovery.text: The collision crumpled the crust upward, creating the tallest mountains on Earth.

twist.text: Fossils of sea creatures sit atop Everest â€” that rock was once an ocean floor.

climax.text: The Indian plate is still pushing north at 5 cm per year. The mountains keep rising.

punchline.text: Everest has seashells at the top. Mountains are just crumpled ocean floor.

quiz.question: Why are there marine fossils on top of Mount Everest?
options: The rock was once ocean floor pushed up by collision
